remarks.format: ## Remarks 沿方向线垂直的任何直线上的所有点都是相同的颜色。All points along any line perpendicular to the orientation line are the same color. 起始线垂直于方向线，并经过矩形的一个角。The starting line is perpendicular to the orientation line and passes through one of the corners of the rectangle. 起始行中的所有点都是开始颜色。All points on the starting line are the starting color. 然后，结束行与方向线垂直，并经过矩形的一个角。Then ending line is perpendicular to the orientation line and passes through one of the corners of the rectangle. 结束行的所有点都是结束颜色。All points on the ending line are the ending color. 方向线的角度决定了起始和结束直线经过的角。The angle of the orientation line determines which corners the starting and ending lines pass through. 例如，如果角度介于0到90度之间，则起始线会经过左上角，而结束行将穿过右下角。For example, if the angle is between 0 and 90 degrees, the starting line passes through the upper-left corner, and the ending line passes through the lower-right corner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法指定一个 `focus` ，即渐变只由结束颜色组成的点。This method specifies a `focus`, which is the point where the gradient is composed only of the ending color. `focus`参数表示一个位置，该位置的比例为沿渐变线的距离。The `focus` parameter represents a location as a proportion of the distance along the gradient line. 渐变将基于一个钟形曲线形状， (正态分布) 到两侧。The gradient falls off to the starting color based on a bell curve shape (normal distribution) to either side. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个新的 。Creates a new . - 使用此画笔在屏幕上绘制具有从左向右的线性过渡的椭圆。Uses this brush to draw an ellipse to the screen that has a linear, left-to-right transition of colors. - 转换 以在中心产生一个钟形曲线的曲线。Transforms the to have a bell shaped curve with its peak in the center. - 使用钟形画笔在屏幕上绘制第二个椭圆。Draws a second ellipse to the screen using the bell-shaped brush. 请注意，下半椭圆的渐变从蓝色转换为红色，然后转换回蓝色。Notice that the gradient of the lower ellipse transitions from blue to red and then back to blue.
